title: Design and Finite Element Analysis of Drone Frame
intro: The drone frame was designed using CATIA V5, followed by a structural analysis to evaluate its mechanical performance.

sections.title: Overview
sections.content: This design was created in CATIA V5. The images showcase the parts in front, side, and isometric views.

sections.title: Draft
sections.content: The draft of the design was created in Onshape. All dimensions are in millimeters.

sections.title: Finite Element Analysis - ANSYS FEA Structural
sections.content: The FEA analysis was performed using ANSYS. A mesh was applied with appropriate boundary conditions, and results were obtained, including total deformation, equivalent stress and strain, maximum shear stress, principal stress, and shear stress.
